snippet.title: DF CONNECTED | UNDEREVENT 2022 TRAILER
snippet.description:
DF CONNECTED is the first half of the DONTFORGET project, a duology of Undertale/Deltarune fan-games which aim to expand upon the story of the original games.
What will you find within the ANGEL'S HEAVEN...?

Check out the game here (available in early access now):
https://gamejolt.com/games/dontforget/150752

Check out UNDEREVENT 2022 here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TSOyg3n0GFM

Trailer Credits:
- Directed by RickyG
- Editing by Landimizer
- Cutscene Artwork by Prima
- Thumbnail Artwork by Desolattie
- Music by Perpetrator and Synth Mints
- (For full game credits, see the GameJolt page!)

That's all I can say for now. After all, it's rude to talk about someone who's listening.
